University of Michigan
titlepage.titleproper:
Finding Aid for
Tatos Doumanian certificate, 1919.
titlepage.author:
Finding aid prepared by:
Polly Reynolds

did.abstract: Papers of a soldier in the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition."

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Dick Doumanian, of Traverse City, Michigan, in 2006 (Donor no.: 9743).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, Tatos Doumanian certificate, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Served in Company D., U.S. 339th Infantry, during the American intervention in Archangel, Russia.
